page.title: 17ROAD TRANSPORT,KNOTTINGLEY
page.content: Because it is an{industrial}town Knottingley has a lot of heavy transport passing through it.A lot of {lorries}come off the{M62}and the{A1}. The{buses}are run for the West Yorks. P.T.E.by South Yorkshire Road Transport ,a{private}Pontefract firm (blue buses with{conductresses}) and West Riding Automobile Co.,a{National company(red or green and cream). Outside weekday peak hours it costs {15p}for children and{30p}for adults for any journey.You can also use {Saverstrips.}You buy Saverstrips from the post office which allow you to have 12 rides for the price of 10. Wherever you live there's always a bus stop near your house.Buses come at least once every half hour. Most of the{car traffic}comes at the times of shifts at Kellingley Colliery.
